title: Grub4dos Multiboot ISO CD, Hiren BootCD 11.1 & Ultimate BootCD 5.03

forumNotes.author: jeffreytan
forumNotes.content:
I'm new a this.  

I need help in creating a multiboot iso CD to boot Hiren BootCD 11.1 \& Ultimate BootCD 5.03.  

Below is the menu.lst but it does not work. Need help please.  
title Hiren's BootCD v11.1  
find --set-root/ISO/hbcd111.iso  
map --mem/ISO/hbcd111.iso (hd32)  
map --hook  
root (hd32)  
chainloader (hd32)  

title Ultimate BootCD v5.03  
find --set-root/ISO/ubcd503.iso  
map --mem/ISO/ubcd503.iso (hd32)  
map --hook  
root (hd32)  
chainloader (hd32)

forumNotes.author: shamurshamur
forumNotes.content:
> title Ultimate BootCD v5.03  
> find --set-root/ISO/ubcd503.iso  
> map --mem/ISO/ubcd503.iso (hd32)  
> map --hook  
> root (hd32)  
> chainloader (hd32)

you are not leaving any gap between **--set-root** and **/ISO/ubcd503.iso** .  

try this one.  

> title Ultimate BootCD v5.03  
> find --set-root /ISO/ubcd503.iso  
> map /ISO/ubcd503.iso (0xff) \|\| map --mem /ISO/ubcd503.iso (0xff)   
> map --hook  
> root (0xff)  
> chainloader (0xff)

look at some more examples here.  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=5041](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=5041 "External link")

forumNotes.author: shanming163
forumNotes.content: That is correct！You need some gaps.And if your iso size is a littl big，you need wait one more minutes.![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)

forumNotes.author: jeffreytan
forumNotes.content:
Thank guys.  

I've sorted it out and it's working now.
